tests.name: Bootstrap Tooltip Init
tests.description: Ensures Bootstrap tooltips initialize correctly on page load.

tests.name: Add to Cart AJAX
tests.description: Checks that items are added to the cart via AJAX without page reload and updates UI elements like cart count and totals.

tests.name: Quantity Update AJAX
tests.description: Verifies that increasing or decreasing item quantity updates item total, cart subtotal, delivery, and grand total live.

tests.name: Remove from Cart AJAX
tests.description: Checks that removing items from cart updates the UI and recalculates totals without page reload.

tests.name: Empty Cart Message
tests.description: Displays an empty cart message when all items are removed via AJAX.

tests.name: Proceed to Checkout Button
tests.description: Validates visibility and correctness of the checkout button and its behavior.

tests.name: Stripe Checkout Session
tests.description: Ensures Stripe checkout session is initiated with correct payload and redirect occurs successfully.

tests.name: Stripe Cancelled Page
tests.description: Displays a cancellation message if payment is cancelled from Stripe.
